about_the_game:
Prepare to set sail on an epic adventure in 'Anchored Hearts: A Tale of Destiny'!

Take on the role of Nova, the once celebrated infamous pirate known as 'La Belladona'. You find yourself flung into prison, wrongfully accused of a crime you never committed. As a fugitive, can you navigate through choppy waters to unravel the threads of your fate? Be wary though - it won’t be smooth sailing to make it back to the pirate haven of Libertown!


Test your skills and strategic prowess as you fearlessly navigate the raging seas. Balance the needs of your crew and ship as you plot a course through uncharted waters. Embrace the spirit of adventure as you uncover secrets, hunt for treasure and fight your way to freedom!




Set cannons to blast as you take on rival vessels in swashbuckling combat! Evade, attack and board their ships to give them a piece of your mind! Steal and pillage gold to your heart's content as you upgrade your vessel along your journey, and force your enemies to bow to your whims.




Can you find the secrets behind your cursed fate and save yourself from the gallows? Meet a captivating cast of fellow pirates, minstrels, witches and political adversaries as you piece together the mystery and magic behind your false imprisonment.




Even romance has a place upon the high seas. Xander, your childhood best friend and loyal second-in-command has always been steadfast - but do new doubts about your criminal background dash any hopes of love? Or will Lorenzo, your sworn enemy, sway your favour with his teasing flirtations - and can you truly trust him? Dare to share your heart with either, both, or forge everlasting friendships as you ride the waves of romance!

content_descriptors.notes: Some implied references to mature sexual themes and violence (no gore), but no explicit content.
